featuredUpdate.title: MediScan Gold Plan Launched!
featuredUpdate.description: We're excited to announce the MediScan Gold Plan! with Kcoins Enjoy unlimited scans, priority support, and exclusive features with a single subscription. Upgrade now from your account page to experience the best of MediScan.
